p.text: icon , which replaced the mouse pointer when you hover the cursor on the object.

p.textAll: Each icon has its own cursor name . All names cursors can be found in Auxiliary words -> Cursors

sample.sampletitle: Options for the position of a button
sample.samplecode: Window1.Knopka1.Kursor = "Heading North" Window1.Knopka1.Kursor = RukaWindow1.Knopka1.Kursor = Window1.Window1.KursorWindow1.Knopka1.Kursor = Window1.Tekst1 . Text
